cards.title: Spooky Treats
cards.extraText: Our Spooky Treats are handpicked with the spirit of Halloween in mind. From ghost-shaped chocolates to pumpkin spice candies, every bite is a magical experience. Perfect for trick-or-treaters and Halloween parties!

cards.title: Haunted Decor
cards.extraText: Transform your home into a haunted house! Explore creepy decorations, glowing lanterns, eerie props, and themed accessories that will make your Halloween unforgettable. Turn ordinary rooms into spook-tacular spaces!

cards.title: Costume Ideas
cards.extraText: Discover costume inspirations for all ages and styles: witches, vampires, skeletons, and magical creatures. Whether for a party, contest, or personal fun, our ideas will help you stand out and enchant everyone.

about.title: About Halloween
about.text: Night of all the saints, or all the dead, is celebrated on October 31 and it is a very fun international celebration, this celebration comes from ancient origins, and is already celebrated by everyone.
about.extraText: Halloween originated from the ancient Celtic festival of Samhain, where people lit bonfires and wore costumes to ward off ghosts. Today, it is celebrated with costumes, trick-or-treating, and spooky decorations across the globe, blending folklore with modern festivities.
